channel.title: God Damn Pigs
channel.description: Well, I have a question. My girlfriend has been verbally abused since I've known her by her mother's boyfriend. Her mom doesn't care or do anything about it and I have never had the chance until now. Today her mothers boyfriend kicked her out of the house and told her never to come back. Her mother didn't say anything or try to stop her at all. My girlfriend then came over here and told us what had happened. We ran back over to her house and asked if my gf could stay here for the weekend just to let things cool down. Her mom said no and told us that she had called my girlfriend in as a run away. Now we wait for the cop to get there and tell him what happened and he didn't write anything down and told us to leave. Now I don't know what else to do because the police aren't doing anything and I can't afford to get assault and battery charges. Does anyone have any ideas?

item.title: God Damn Pigs
item.dc:creator: @Blackester Blackester
item.description:
@Blackester wrote:

therealjdb:

I think I might go over there when hes not home and run a wire to his guitar string so the next time he plays it…well you get the point.

caramelize his engine, (put suger in his gas tank)

Read full topic

item.title: God Damn Pigs
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Basically what I’d do is leave him a note saying to leave enter your gf’s name here alone, and if he doesn’t then you’ll make his life a living hell. he may know who you are, but there won’t be any proof of it. But of course, he may call your bluff so you need to start off by doing something really bad to him, like smash his windshield. That’s what I would do. You may want to talk it over with your girlfriend first, they tend to not like it when you try to do what is best for them without their permission.

Read full topic

go ahead, just try not to get caught

item.title: God Damn Pigs
item.dc:creator: @Teh_Freak Teh Freak
item.description:
@Teh_Freak wrote:

Well, you get the guy, alone, and beat the entire shit out of him, until he is entirely knocked out, then curb stomp him, thats always fun, and then you lie him in a ditch, walk away, and with no witnesses not shit will happen, because all you need is an allibi (sp), last time i beat the shit out of someone entirely they had no proof that i did it, you cant get the shit beat out of you and blame it on the pope, but yea, no evidence/witnesses and you can safely ensure someone gets an ass beating.

Read full topic

item.title: God Damn Pigs
item.dc:creator: @Original_Daniel Original Daniel
item.description:
@Original_Daniel wrote:

wow…

If I were you, I would go over there and do anything you can to piss him off, as soon as he lays a hand on you then beat the crap out of him. If he decides to charge, say you were acting in self defence, and then bring up all the stuff that he has done. - This is assuming you think you could beat him up. I wouldn’t advise this if you are a 5 ft stick

Have your gf either stay at yours, or another rellies house.

Read full topic
